task.title: Windows NT Terminal Server Configuration
task.shortdesc: Windows NT Terminal Server configuration procedure.

step.cmd: Install on the server and make its shortcuts available to all users.
If you need to run multiple instances of , make sure you add the -Dcom.oxygenxml.MultipleInstances=true parameter in the .bat or .sh startup script.

Make sure you allocate sufficient memory to by adding the -Xmx parameter either in the .bat or .sh startup script, or in the .vmoptions configuration file (if you start it from an executable launcher).
